info.name: FunFile Modern Redesign
info.description: A More Modern Design For FunFile. Important: If you're having issues updating this style first uninstall it, then reload the page and install it again after selecting your settings. I highly recommend using Stylus over Stylish for both Firefox and Chrome and other supported browsers, mainly because that is what i use for my browsers when i create these styles. Here's a link to the add-on: Stylus for Firefox Stylus for Chrome If you have any issues, questions or feedback, you can contact me here Adam-J-Frost@outlook.com. If you would like to help me out, you can donate to me here: Donate via Ko-fi. I hope you like this style and thank you for using it!
info.additionalInfo:

• Minor Fix.

2020/01/21:
• Added Light Mode.
• Added Option To Hide The Tag Cloud.
• Added Option To Use A Preset Background Or Custom Background.
• Fixed TV Guide Page.

2020/01/20:
• Initial Release.
